** Drivers: http://www.sagernotebook.com/pages/notebooks/download.cfm?ProductType=4381  (Note - Windows but has additional info)

=== Current Issues ===

Issues:
* Network Manager Applet does '''not''' work but Network Monitor Applet does
* Power Management
** Lid Close - No effect
** Suspend - Suspends but does not resume
** Hibernate - Hibernates but does not resume
** F4 does work but listed as no below because suspend/hibernate does not.
* CPU Scaling does not work
